attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish the Governement to change its policy regarding Child Benefit payments to foreign nationals and to take action in stopping Child Benefit being paid to children living outside the UK to foreign nationals. If this is not possible I request the Prime Minister to debate this issue in Parliament asap. How does the Government know that such claims are geunine and what safeguards are in place to stop fraudulent claims?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
